name: @postclick/php-logger
description: A library for standardized logs & metric format, based on monolog/monolog

scripts.test:unit: docker run -it -v $(pwd)/../..:/drone/src -v $HOME/php-logger-coverage:/tmp/code-coverage/ -w /drone/src/packages/php-logger eu.gcr.io/postclick-live-1/php-test sh -c 'composer install --no-interaction --no-progress --prefer-dist --optimize-autoloader --classmap-authoritative && /home/www-data/vendor/bin/phpunit --testdox --coverage-html /tmp/code-coverage -c phpunit.xml.dist'
scripts.test:unit:text: docker run -it -v $(pwd)/../..:/drone/src -w /drone/src/packages/php-logger eu.gcr.io/postclick-live-1/php-test sh -c 'composer install --no-interaction --no-progress --prefer-dist --optimize-autoloader --classmap-authoritative && /home/www-data/vendor/bin/phpunit --testdox --coverage-text -c phpunit.xml.dist'
